REME_ProfessionalPlagiarism.NAME: Professional Plagiarism
REME_ProfessionalPlagiarism.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 card from !M! cards to play.

REME_SingleHolding.NAME: Single Holding
REME_SingleHolding.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 1 card. NL Deal damage equal to base damage of it +3.

REME_FearOfPain.NAME: Fear Of Pain
REME_FearOfPain.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is Exhausted, NL deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

REME_Scribble.NAME: Scribble
REME_Scribble.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Max HP. NL Lose !M! HP. NL Exhaust.

REME_ForAll.NAME: For All
REME_ForAll.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put all cost 0 cards from your draw pile into your hand.
REME_ForAll.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Put all cost 0 cards from your draw pile into your hand.

REME_TheLastStrike.NAME: The Last Strike
REME_TheLastStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this card is Exhausted ,play it to a random enemy and add 1 copy to your hand.

REME_GreenPollution.NAME: Green Pollution
REME_GreenPollution.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you discard a card during your turn,apply !M! Poison to ALL enemies.
REME_GreenPollution.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you discard a card during your turn,apply !M! Poison to ALL enemies.

REME_ShadowForm.NAME: Shadow Form
REME_ShadowForm.DESCRIPTION: When you play first !M! card(s) each turn,add a copy cost 0 with Ethereal , Exhaust to your hand.

REME_ShadowStrike.NAME: Shadow Strike
REME_ShadowStrike.DESCRIPTION: When played or discarded,deal !D! damage to a random enemy.

REME_DataAnalysis.NAME: Data Analysis
REME_DataAnalysis.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage and gain Block equal to [E] your earn + !M! .

REME_WorshipGod.NAME: Worship God
REME_WorshipGod.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust cards of other colors and replace them with those of your color.They cost 1 less.  NL Exhaust.
REME_WorshipGod.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust cards of other colors and replace them with those of your color.They cost 1 less.  NL Retain,Exhaust.

REME_BuildACard.NAME: Build A Card
REME_BuildACard.DESCRIPTION: Suture at most !M! cards. NL Can`t be *Build *A *Card.

REME_AllRoundStrike.NAME: All Round Strike
REME_AllRoundStrike.DESCRIPTION: Innate . Ethereal . NL When played,discarded or Exhausted,deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL There is no escape from this NL Exhaust.

REME_GrazeFinale.NAME: Graze Finale
REME_GrazeFinale.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if there are no cards in your draw pile. NL Heal !M! HP.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: My draw pile NL must be #rEmpty.

REME_ShortnessOfBreath.NAME: Shortness Of Breath
REME_ShortnessOfBreath.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card,then discard your draw pile.
REME_ShortnessOfBreath.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards,then discard your draw pile.

REME_Cut.NAME: Cut
REME_Cut.DESCRIPTION: Every 3rd attack you play deal extra !M! damage.

REME_Shoggoth.NAME: Shoggoth
REME_Shoggoth.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Suture this with 1 card in discard pile. NL Exhaust.

REME_CurseOfMatryoshka.NAME: Curse Of Matryoshka
REME_CurseOfMatryoshka.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Ethereal.Can be Upgraded any number of times. NL Reduce 1 upgrade times instead of Exhausted.

REME_Flogging.NAME: Flogging
REME_Flogging.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play 1 card,deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

REME_CopyPotion.NAME: Copy Potion
REME_CopyPotion.DESCRIPTION: Act the same effect as your first non-empty potion. NL Exhaust.

REME_FirmDetermination.NAME: Firm Determination
REME_FirmDetermination.DESCRIPTION: If you have keys: NL *Ruby :Gain !M! Strength. NL *Emerald :Gain !M! Dexterity. NL *Sapphire :Gain !B! Block.

REME_ACTH.NAME: ACTH
REME_ACTH.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! *Adrenaline to your hand. NL Exhaust.

REME_CRH.NAME: CRH
REME_CRH.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! *ACTH to your hand. NL Exhaust.

REME_BattleFury.NAME: Battle Fury
REME_BattleFury.DESCRIPTION: When you play *Strike,add a copy cost 0 with Ethereal,Exhaust to your hand.
REME_BattleFury.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL When you play *Strike,add a copy cost 0 with Ethereal,Exhaust to your hand.

REME_MusicOfDeath.NAME: Music Of Death
REME_MusicOfDeath.DESCRIPTION: When you make copies into your draw pile in your turn,make !M! extra.

REME_Repentance.NAME: Repentance
REME_Repentance.DESCRIPTION: At the end of each your turn,deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

REME_Whirling.NAME: Whirling
REME_Whirling.DESCRIPTION: Put cards cost 1,2 and 3 each from draw pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.
REME_Whirling.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put cards cost 1,2 and 3 each from draw pile into your hand.

REME_MagicPocketWatch.NAME: Magic Pocket Watch
REME_MagicPocketWatch.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards and Retain them. NL !RSM2! % gain a extra turn. NL (Reduce after triggering)

REME_ResidualAnger.NAME: Residual Anger
REME_ResidualAnger.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

REME_Fury.NAME: Fury
REME_Fury.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle !RSM2! *Residual *Anger into your draw pile.Increase the number by !M!  NL Exhaust.

REME_Compress.NAME: Compress
REME_Compress.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Discard all cards drawn that cost 0,gain [E] for each.

REME_TheoryOfElimination.NAME: Theory Of Elimination
REME_TheoryOfElimination.DESCRIPTION: Scry  !M! . NL  Exhaust cards you choose.

REME_EmptyShield.NAME: Empty Shield
REME_EmptyShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block for each empty position in your hand.
REME_EmptyShield.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !M! Block for each empty position in your hand.

REME_SpectralBlade.NAME: Spectral Blade
REME_SpectralBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for each card you discard this combat.

REME_SelfUpgrade.NAME: Self Upgrade
REME_SelfUpgrade.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! additional cards in card rewards.

REME_WheelOfFate.NAME: Wheel Of Fate
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 点 #yBlock . NL 4.Open the #yPuzzle #yBox . NL 5. #yExhaust your hand and add that many random cards cost 0 this turn. NL 6.Deal 6 damage to random enemy 6 times.

REME_EyeOfCthun.NAME: Eye Of C`Thun
REME_EyeOfCthun.DESCRIPTION: Lose !D! HP randomly split among ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

REME_HeartOfCthun.NAME: Heart Of C`Thun
REME_HeartOfCthun.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

REME_MawOfCthun.NAME: Maw Of C`Thun
REME_MawOfCthun.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses !M! Strength. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Exhaust.

REME_CthunTheShattered.NAME: The Shattered
REME_CthunTheShattered.DESCRIPTION: Random enemy lose 1% of their Max HP.Repeat !D! times. NL Exhaust.

REME_LeechingPoison.NAME: Leeching Poison
REME_LeechingPoison.DESCRIPTION: Heal HP equal to unblocked damage next attack card played. NL Exhaust.

REME_CreativeMind.NAME: Creative Mind
REME_CreativeMind.DESCRIPTION: Channel one Creation orb. NL draw !M! card.
REME_CreativeMind.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Channel one Creation orb. NL draw !M! cards.

REME_WoundSpread.NAME: Wound Spread
REME_WoundSpread.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable . NL Vulnerable of target is divided into two parts and calculated separately.

REME_AccumulateSteadily.NAME: Accumulate Steadily
REME_AccumulateSteadily.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Strength gained is increased by 1 permanently.

REME_Interweave.NAME: Interweave
REME_Interweave.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle !M! *Light and *Dark into your draw pile.

REME_NightmareStrike.NAME: Nightmare Strike
REME_NightmareStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle !M! *Dark into your draw pile.

REME_Seeding.NAME: Seeding
REME_Seeding.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle !M! *Dark into your draw pile. NL Draw 1 card.

REME_Light.NAME: Light
REME_Light.DESCRIPTION: When drawn,draw 1 card,play and Exhaust this. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.

REME_Dark.NAME: Dark
REME_Dark.DESCRIPTION: When drawn,draw 1 card,play and Exhaust this. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

REME_ColdRelease.NAME: Cold Release
REME_ColdRelease.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you receive unblocked attack damage, Channel !M! Frost.
REME_ColdRelease.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you receive unblocked attack damage, Channel !M! Frost.

REME_Unstoppable.NAME: Unstoppable
REME_Unstoppable.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! Metallicize.
REME_Unstoppable.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! Metallicize.
